wikipedia_page.main: Angus Weatherit Scott (16 August 1927 – 16 March 1990) was a British track and field athlete who competed  in sprinting events. He represented Great Britain at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was affiliated with the Achilles Club. He was part of the winning British 4×400 metres relay team at the 1950 European Athletics Championships.

response: Angus Scott is an international sports television presenter, journalist and university lecturer. He has worked for beIN SPORTS, ITV Sport and Setanta Sports. He mainly covers football and rugby union, but has also hosted cricket  and motorsport coverage.
